description: This source file implements a plugin class (`BootimgBiosXenPlugin`) for a build system that creates boot images for systems that utilize Xen hypervisor. It includes methods for configuring disk images and partitions, specifically setting up syslinux configs with Xen kernel arguments, importing external modules dynamically, and handling initialization of BIOS-related components.

classes.name: BootimgBiosXenPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class for creating Xen boot images, including methods for disk installation, partition configuration, and preparation within the build process.

methods.name: __init__(cls)
methods.description: Constructor, initializes BIOS class instance (note: not automatically called).

methods.name: __instanciateBIOSClass(cls)
methods.description: Dynamically imports the 'bootimg-pcbios' module and creates its plugin instance.

methods.name: do_install_disk(cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Finalizes disk image installation, delegating to the BIOS module instance.

methods.name: do_configure_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Configures partition-specific files, especially syslinux configuration with Xen and kernel arguments.

methods.name: do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Prepares the partition contents, installing Xen kernel, initrd files, and other assets.

ctags.name: do_configure_partition
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_configure_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)

ctags.name: do_install_disk
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_install_disk(cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)

ctags.name: do_prepare_partition
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
